      • getRequestFilteredSellOffer

        public RequestFilteredSellOffer getRequestFilteredSellOffer()
        Reads all the input fields in the UI and generates a new RequestFilteredSellOffer object. Also performs input validation and returns null for invalid offers.

        If the user has clicked the checkbox for 'My Offers Only', then input validation is short-circuited, and numeric input for min and max PPU and weight are ignored.

        Returns:
        A new SellOfferFront object made from UI input fields. If the SellOfferFront is invalid in some way, returns null.

      • setControlsActive

        public void setControlsActive(boolean active,
                              boolean affectCommodityType)
        Turns on or off most of the UI; should be called in response to a check button. Turns off (or on) the text fields for min and max PPU, min and max weight, and the spinners for commodity type and weight units.
        Parameters:
        active - Whether to turn everything on or off
        affectCommodityType - If this is false, the spinner for commodity type will not be affected; otherwise, it will be changed just like the other widgets

      • setUnitsSelection

        public void setUnitsSelection(java.lang.String chosenUnits)
        Set the units of weight spinner to a given commodity type
        Parameters:
        chosenUnits - The string representation of the units you would like to choose
